function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in urban planning and management","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Incorporate guidelines for hygiene and sanitation into urban planning, implement regular cleaning and maintenance of green areas","Technologies":"Smart city technology for monitoring cleanliness and hygiene, IoT devices for waste management","People":"Residents, visitors, and urban population","Owner":"Urban planners, local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited education and awareness about public health and environmental hygiene","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to disease outbreaks and inadequate environmental care","Mitigation":"Develop educational programs on public health and environmental hygiene, conduct awareness campaigns on the importance of cleanliness and environmental care","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, mobile apps for environmental education, social media for awareness campaigns","People":"Adults, children, and community members","Owner":"Educational institutions, environmental organizations, local community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to green space and nature resulting in poor mental and physical health","Impact":"Increased stress, reduced well-being, and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Expand access to green spaces, promote equitable distribution of urban greenery, and integrate nature into urban planning","Technologies":"GIS mapping for identifying green space gaps, urban design software for integrating greenery, virtual reality for accessible nature experiences","People":"City dwellers, urban residents, and individuals with limited access to nature","Owner":"Urban planners, local government, and community organizations"}]}
